Attacks.Name: Metal Claw
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Iron Tail
Attacks.Effect: If a critical and a wild are rolled, this attack has a piercing effect, ignoring the target's defense dice.

Attacks.Name: Mirror Shot
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character has -1 dice on their next attack.

Superpowers.Name: Steel Fortress
Superpowers.Effect: Reduce damage from all incoming attacks by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Superpowers.Name: Magnetic Pull
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. Pull that character towards Acereon by short range.

Additional Attack.Name: Gyro Ball
Additional Attack.Effect: This attack gains +1 strength for each power token on Acereon.
